commandDescription: Retrieve and refresh org metadata to local directory (i.e. retrieve all metadata from org).
ignorebackupFlagDescription: flag to ignore creating a local backup of retrieved files
ignoreinstalledFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving installed (or managed) package files (excludes all installed metadata)
ignorenamespacesFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving namespace prefixed package files (excludes all namespaced metadata)
ignorehiddenFlagDescription: (Recommended) flag to ignore retrieving hidden or non-editable managed files such as managed ApexClasses
ignorefoldersFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving folder e.g. email, reports, dashboards and documents
ignorestaticresourcesFlagDescription: flag to ignore retrieving all static resources
manifestonlyFlagDescription: flag to only create manifest/package.xml and don't download meta data files
stagedirectoryFlagDescription: staging root folder (default is stage) e.g. DevOrg/retrieve/src
stagemodeFlagDescription: stage mode (default is false) otherwise dev mode (default is true) e.g. src
splitFlagDescription: flag to split package.xml into package1.xml and package2.xml to address 10000 file download limit per request
containsFiltersFlagDescription: filters (case sensitive) for only meta components containing text e.g. -r ABC_,Xyz
startsWithFiltersFlagDescription: filters (case sensitive) for only meta components starting with text e.g. -w xyz
createcsvFlagDescription: create csv flag to create csv file to easily compare metadata items in excel
